name: 1: All foliage, twigs, and branches present.
2: Some or all foliage lost, possibly some twigs lost, all branches usually present.
3: No foliage, up to 50% of twigs lost, most branches present.
4: No foliage or twigs, up to 50% of branches lost.
5: No foliage or twigs. Some sound and rotting branch stubs may be present.
6: No foliage, twigs, branches, or branch stubs.
